definition: soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
in the depth of one's soul

sentences.english: Father Mabeuf was one of those persons for whom plants have souls.
sentences.chinese: 和某些人一樣，馬白夫公公也認爲植物是有靈魂的。

sentences.english: The greed, discrimination and vulgarism are not souls.
sentences.chinese: 貪婪，歧視和庸俗沒有靈魂。

sentences.english: Ultimately, being with a true soul partner is all about being purposeful in love.
sentences.chinese: 在愛情中擁有一位真正的靈魂伴侶是每個人所希冀的。

sentences.english: What if last night God destroyed my soul and put in a new soul?
sentences.chinese: 如果昨晚上帝毀掉了我的靈魂並創造了新的那怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Way back at the start of the semester when we asked,Why believe in souls?
sentences.chinese: 學期一開始的時候我們研究過爲何要相信靈魂的存在？

sentences.english: Mayhap , they will rebirth the soul of a nation.
sentences.chinese: 也許，一個國家的靈魂也會因此重生。

sentences.english: Creativity is the soul of the advertisement, which endows the advertisement with vitality and life.
sentences.chinese: 創意是廣告的靈魂，是賦予廣告精神與生命的活動。

sentences.english: Heroic soul grows out of fashion like an old song.
sentences.chinese: 渴望絢爛的靈魂早已老去，逝成一首古老的歌曲。

sentences.english: The Mon Calamari are said to be the soul of the Rebel Alliance.
sentences.chinese: 蒙克萊梅利人常被稱爲是反抗軍聯盟的靈魂人物。

sentences.english: Whither go these majestic irradiations of the soul?Into the shadow;
sentences.chinese: 靈魂的那種莊嚴光輝放射到什麼地方去呢？

sentences.english: It is the perfection and the supreme adornment of the justified soul.
sentences.chinese: 這是完善和最高人民法院裝飾品的理由靈魂。

sentences.english: Those behave fawningly to rich one have no money received and that means they offer their soul, their dignity for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 奉承的人沒有錢收而獻出他們的靈魂他們的尊嚴。

sentences.english: Until then he had been afraid to expose his naked souls.
sentences.chinese: 在那之前，他一直害怕展現自己赤露的靈魂。

sentences.english: Yeats describes mankind's fleshly predicament as a soul fastened to a dying animal.
sentences.chinese: 描繪了當靈魂依附於瀕死的動物時人類肉體的窘境。

sentences.english: The political theory course takes the theory teaching as its basis, and ideological education as its soul.
sentences.chinese: 政治理論課以理論教學爲基礎，思想教育爲靈魂。

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
